Articles.Content: I am in the planning stages of a mod that adds stockalike cold war era aircraft. I want to start by making a 2.5m B-36 cockpit with one of the default IVAs but every single time I look for a tutorial it takes me to this large thread with a bunch of links to different resources but every single link is broken. I want to get my mod out before the end of 2021. I've looked at @Beales tutorial and its great but its just an engine. I'm sure that there's a tutorial out there but it would take me weeks to find it. If anybody could link me to a tutorial that would be very helpful.
It is old, but still works.
